title: DTAIS Workshop:
text:
Part 1: Storytelling
In this section, we will discuss strategies for communicating research to others following good story telling principles. This will include:

Telling a story
Designing slides
Giving a talk



Part 2: Visualizing Information
In this section, we will discuss design principles for visualizing information through charts. This will include:

The Human Visual-Memory System
The Psychology of Data Visualization
10 Data Viz Best Practices

title: Storytelling
text:
KEYBOARD SHORTCUTS FOR SLIDES:

Use h to see a list of other shortcuts.
